subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Paul Harris scored a career-high 28 points and Jonny Flynn had 24 to lead Syracuse to an 87-73 win over Villanova on Saturday, the Wildcats’ fourth straight loss.
snippet: Paul Harris scored a career-high 28 points and Jonny Flynn had 24 to lead Syracuse to an 87-73 win over Villanova on Saturday, the Wildcats’ fourth straight loss.
